Description:
Skills:
- Strong leadership skills to effectively manage a team and delegate tasks.
- Excellent communication skills to effectively interact with guests, staff, and management.
- Strong organizational and time management skills to efficiently handle multiple tasks and prioritize work.
- Proficient in handling front desk operations, including check-ins, check-outs, reservations, and guest inquiries.
- Knowledge of hotel systems and software used at the front desk, such as property management systems (PMS) and online booking platforms.
- Ability to handle difficult situations with professionalism and problem-solving skills.
- Familiarity with hotel policies and procedures to ensure and smooth operations.
- Attention to detail to ensure accuracy paperwork records.
- Flexibility to work in shifts and adapt to changing schedules.
- Customer service orientation to ensure guest satisfaction and handle complaints or requests effectively.Job Details
